data.lyric:
[ti:Never Say Never]
[ar:Cole Swindell/Lainey Wilson]
[al:Never Say Never]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Never Say Never - Cole Swindell/Lainey Wilson
[00:07.29]Lyrics by：Chase McGill/Cole Swindell/Jessie Alexander
[00:14.59]I told my momma I told my friends
[00:18.03]When it comes to her when it comes to him
[00:21.58]Never again last time was the last time
[00:25.26]That time nearly did us in yeah too much drama
[00:30.11]Girl you're a match you're gasoline
[00:33.23]We just burn too fast so here we are
[00:37.00]Lighting up that spark yeah we tried to run
[00:40.22]But we didn't get far
[00:42.46]I never say never with you
[00:44.83]I end up together with you
[00:46.51]It's hell and it's heaven with you baby
[00:50.15]Anything's possible
[00:51.63]The highs are unstoppable
[00:53.29]It's so uncontrollable it's crazy
[00:57.18]We say we won't and then we do
[01:00.64]You're all I want I never say never with you
[01:04.78]
[01:09.11]You got a touch that kills me makes me feel alive
[01:12.84]Couldn't turn me off yeah even if you tried
[01:16.16]So keep turning me on and turn out the lights
[01:19.70]Who knows tonight we might get it right
[01:23.14]
[01:23.75]I never say never with you
[01:25.92]I end up together with you
[01:27.63]It's hell and it's heaven with you baby
[01:31.22]Anything's possible
[01:32.69]The highs are unstoppable
[01:34.44]It's so uncontrollable it's crazy
[01:38.50]We say we won't and then we do
[01:41.76]You're all I want I never say never with you yeah
[01:48.40]
[01:49.90]I never say never with you
[01:52.08]
[01:58.48]I never say never with you
[02:00.28]I end up together with you
[02:02.10]It's hell and it's heaven with you baby
[02:05.91]Anything's possible
[02:07.05]The highs are unstoppable
[02:08.92]It's so uncontrollable it's crazy
[02:12.63]We say we won't and then we do
[02:16.01]You're all I want I never say never with you
[02:19.47]We say we won't
[02:21.10]But what's the use
[02:22.92]Baby come on I never say never with you
[02:27.52]
[02:28.27]Oh no
[02:29.77]You're all I want I never say never with you
[02:34.77]No no no no no
[02:37.10]
[02:38.71]I told my momma I told my friends
[02:41.95]When it comes to her when it comes to him
[02:45.49]Never again
data.trans:
[ti:Never Say Never]
[ar:Cole Swindell/Lainey Wilson]
[al:Never Say Never]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:07.29]//
[00:14.59]我告诉我的妈妈我告诉了我的朋友
[00:18.03]当涉及到她和他的时候
[00:21.58]再也不会发生上一次是最后一次
[00:25.26]那一次差一点就结束了我们太多闹剧
[00:30.11]姑娘你是火柴你是汽油
[00:33.23]我们只是太过放纵所以我们就这样了
[00:37.00]点燃激情我们试图逃跑
[00:40.22]但我们没有走多远
[00:42.46]我从未说过永远不会和你在一起
[00:44.83]我会和你在一起
[00:46.51]宝贝与你在一起犹如地狱与天堂
[00:50.15]一切皆有可能
[00:51.63]嗨翻天势不可挡
[00:53.29]这一切无法控制难以置信
[00:57.18]我们说我们不会然后我们做了
[01:00.64]你是我想要的全部我从未说过绝不和你在一起
[01:04.78]
[01:09.11]你温柔的爱抚让我痛不欲生让我感觉充满活力
[01:12.84]即使你竭尽全力也无法让我心灰意冷
[01:16.16]所以继续让我兴奋起来关掉灯
[01:19.70]谁知道今晚我们会不会如愿以偿
[01:23.14]
[01:23.75]我从未说过永远不会和你在一起
[01:25.92]我会和你在一起
[01:27.63]宝贝与你在一起犹如地狱与天堂
[01:31.22]一切皆有可能
[01:32.69]嗨翻天势不可挡
[01:34.44]这一切无法控制难以置信
[01:38.50]我们说我们不会然后我们做了
[01:41.76]你是我想要的全部我从未说过永远不会和你在一起
[01:48.40]
[01:49.90]我从未说过永远不会和你在一起
[01:52.08]
[01:58.48]我从未说过永远不会和你在一起
[02:00.28]我会和你在一起
[02:02.10]宝贝与你在一起犹如地狱与天堂
[02:05.91]一切皆有可能
[02:07.05]嗨翻天势不可挡
[02:08.92]这一切无法控制难以置信
[02:12.63]我们说我们不会然后我们做了
[02:16.01]你是我想要的全部我从未说过绝不和你在一起
[02:19.47]我们说我们不会
[02:21.10]但是有什么用
[02:22.92]宝贝来吧我绝不会拒绝你
[02:27.52]
[02:28.27]不
[02:29.77]你是我想要的全部我从未说过绝不和你在一起
[02:34.77]不不不
[02:37.10]
[02:38.71]我告诉我的妈妈我告诉了我的朋友
[02:41.95]当涉及到她和他的时候
[02:45.49]再也不会
